CustomField.formula: IF ( Current_Risk_Value__c >= 20, "Very High", IF ( Current_Risk_Value__c >= 12, "High", IF ( Current_Risk_Value__c >= 6, "Medium", IF ( Current_Risk_Value__c >= 3, "Low", IF ( Current_Risk_Value__c >= 1, "Very Low", IF ( Current_Risk_Value__c = 0, "N/A", "TBD" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Current Risk Level
